fullwidth.description: Styles the table as a full width table.

selected-key.description: The `model-value` use custom key field, default use row index.

row-id-prefix.description: The prefix of `data-row-id` attribute value on row element `tr`.

sort-icon-align-end.description: The sort icon will be positioned after the label.

show-progress.description: Styles the table with progress indicator for data loading.

fixed-header.description: Styles the table as a fixed header.

default-col-width.description: Set the default column width for the fixed table.

scroll.description: Set the table container size for the fixed table.
